thread.section_title: Hilton London Tower Bridge - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Overnight stay
thread.title_full: Overnight stay - Review of Hilton London Tower Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: William2201
title: Overnight stay
text: No complaints at all, but is now branded as Double Tree, Hilton. Staff very polite & helpful, comfortable room & we were given a choice of location within hotel as to which room we wanted. Excellent English breakfast, scrambled egg perfect so often it's cold & lumpy! If you get the chance of a cookie when you book the in, they are delicious. Good wi fi & I Mac in room
